revised_title: Reginald Patrick Linstead: A Pioneering Organic Chemist and Administrator
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Reginald Patrick Linstead, a renowned organic chemist and administrator. Linstead made significant contributions to the field of organic chemistry, including work on three-carbon tautomers and the chemistry of olefinic acids. He also played a crucial role in the administration of Imperial College, London, and was involved in various committees and organizations promoting science education and international scientific relations.
